name: pawsroam-webapp
description: PawsRoam - Pet-Friendly Discovery Platform Frontend Assets

scripts.test: echo "Info: No frontend tests specified yet" && exit 0
scripts.dev: echo "Info: No frontend dev server. Run your PHP server."
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: echo "Info: CSS processing (e.g., PostCSS, Sass) not yet configured. Using static CSS."
scripts.build:js: echo "Info: JS bundling/minification (e.g., Webpack, esbuild) not yet configured. Using static JS."
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:css: echo "Info: CSS linting (e.g., Stylelint) not yet configured."
scripts.lint:js: echo "Info: JavaScript linting (e.g., ESLint) not yet configured."
scripts.format: echo "Info: Code formatting (e.g., Prettier) not yet configured."

author: PawsRoam Development Team <dev@pawsroam.com> (https://pawsroam.com)
